answers.answer: If ur not drinkin enough water then yea they will swell.. put ur feet up high for like a hr n if the swellin does down sum or completely u need to call ur doc cuz swellin is a sign of preeclampsia

I'm 29 weeks and my ankles are like gone Lol and my feet are getting on the swollen side. But I also am always on my feet. My blood pressure is perfect. I just keep an eye out at every appointment because I do know swelling can be because of preeclampisa but it could also be nothing. If ur face starts to swell then that's when to really worry!! Also I drink a lot of water each day. Putting my feet up doesn't really help either but its probably because I never have them up long enough? Lol hope I was somewhat help Lol :)
Yea what @arianna92 said!!!!!(: my niece was born at 27 weeks because of that

question: Is it normal for my feet to be swelling Im 24weeks only walk around my house and outside to check mail and if I do go anywhere I walk but my feet have been swelling when all I do is walk around the house
title: swelling?
